trans-unit.source: WorkflowInstance is a lightweight, per-instance runtime for executing a workflow program.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowInstance는 워크플로 프로그램을 실행 하기 위한 간단한, 인스턴스별 런타임.

trans-unit.source: It can be constructed to create a new workflow instance or from existing instance state.
trans-unit.target: 새 워크플로 인스턴스를 생성 하기 위해 구성할 수 있습니다 또는 기존 인스턴스 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: The APIs that <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> exposes are the minimal set of runtime controls from which higher level operations can be implemented.
trans-unit.target: Api는 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl>은 상위 수준의 작업을 구현할 수 있는 런타임 컨트롤의 최소 집합을 노출 합니다.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl>

trans-unit.source: This API set represents the entire breadth of functionality of the runtime.
trans-unit.target: 이 API 집합은 전체 범위의 런타임 기능을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: WorkflowInstance is an abstract class and relies on a host’s implementation of its abstract methods in order to provide host functionality such as synchronization, persistence, tracking, and extensions.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowInstance는 추상 클래스 이며 동기화, 지 속성, 추적 및 확장 같은 호스트 기능을 제공 하기 위해 호스트의 추상 메서드 구현을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: WorkflowInstance is single threaded and assumes that the host synchronizes all access to it.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowInstance는 단일 스레드 이며 호스트가 모든 액세스를 동기화 한다고 가정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to call multiple APIs simultaneously will result in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 동시에 여러 Api를 호출 하려고 하면는 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>throw 됩니다.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: Internally, a WorkflowInstance has two states: Running and Paused.
trans-unit.target: 내부적으로 WorkflowInstance에 두 개의 상태: 실행 중 및 일시 중지 됨입니다.

trans-unit.source: The only way to cause the runtime to transition from paused to running is to call <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지 변환 전의 런타임을 지정 하는 유일한 방법은 실행 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A> 를 호출 하는 것

trans-unit.source: All actions (except Pause) can only be taken while the runtime is Paused.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지를 제외한 모든 동작은 런타임이 일시 중지 된 동안에 가져올 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The runtime will become spontaneously Paused in the following situations: - An error fatal to the runtime has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 런타임에서 될 자발적으로 일시 중지 다음과 같은 경우:-런타임에 치명적인 오류가 발생 했습니다.

trans-unit.source: The host will be signaled through <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnRequestAbort%2A> (which does not signal a transition to Paused) and then notified through <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 통해 호스트가 신호를 받은 됩니다 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnRequestAbort%2A>(입니다 일시 중지 됨으로 전환 신호 하지 않는 경우) 다음 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A> 통해 알림을</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnRequestAbort%2A>

trans-unit.source: - An exception in the workflow was uncaught and escaped the root.
trans-unit.target: -워크플로의 예외가 검색 되었습니다 되지 않았고 루트를 이스케이프 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The host will be notified through the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyUnhandledException%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 호스트를 통해 알림이 표시 됩니다는 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyUnhandledException%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyUnhandledException%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The scheduler has run out of work items and is now <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceState>.
trans-unit.target: -스케줄러 작업 항목이 모두 실행 하 고 이제 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceState>.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceState>

trans-unit.source: The host will be notified through the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 호스트를 통해 알림이 표시 됩니다는 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the scheduler could have run out of work items because the instance is idle or because the instance is complete.
trans-unit.target: 유휴 상태 이거나 인스턴스가 완료 되어 스케줄러에서 작업 항목이 모두 실행 되었을 수 있는 참고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.State%2A> value of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A> property can be used to differentiate between the two.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.State%2A>의 값은 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A>두 구분할 수 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The host can request a change from Running to Paused by calling the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.RequestPause%2A> or <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.PauseWhenPersistable%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> instance returned by the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 호스트의 호출 하 여 실행을 일시 중지 된 변경을 요청할 수는 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.RequestPause%2A>또는 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.PauseWhenPersistable%2A>의 메서드는 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl>에서 반환 된 인스턴스는 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A>속성.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.PauseWhenPersistable%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.RequestPause%2A>

trans-unit.source: This request should not be considered to have a specific response meaning that the host should not attempt to correlate an OnNotify* or <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnRequestAbort%2A> with a specific call to pause. In response to a pause request, the runtime may transition to Paused and call <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A> while the scheduler still has pending work items. The <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.State%2A> value of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A> property can be used to determine whether the scheduler has no more work or was interrupted by a request to pause. The <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.RequestPause%2A> method of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> instance returned by the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A> property is the only method which can be called while the WorkflowInstance is in the Running state. All other methods will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if called.Given the rules for how WorkflowInstance transitions from one state to another, the public notion of Running and Paused can be defined as follows: - Running – The state between a call to <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A> and the next WorkflowInstance.OnNotify*.
trans-unit.target: 있어야 호스트는 OnNotify 상관 관계를 시도 하지 않아야 의미 하는 특정 응답이이 요청 간주 되지 않아야* 또는 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnRequestAbort%2A>를 특정 일시 중지 호출과.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnRequestAbort%2A> 일시 중지 요청에 대 한 응답으로 런타임이 일시 중지 됨 및 호출 전환 될 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A>스케줄러에 보류 중인 작업 항목이 아직 있는 동안.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A> <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.State%2A>의 값은 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A>결정 하기 위해 스케줄러에 더 많은 작업을 일시 중지 요청에 의해 중단 되었습니다 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.State%2A> <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.RequestPause%2A>의 메서드는 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl>에서 반환 된 인스턴스는 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A>속성 WorkflowInstance 실행 중 상태인 동안에 호출 될 수 있는 유일한 방법입니다.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.RequestPause%2A> 다른 모든 메서드를 호출 하는 경우는 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>시킵니다. 다른 WorkflowInstance 한 상태에서 변환 하는 방법에 대 한 규칙을 제공, 실행 중 및 일시 중지 됨의 공용 개념 수 다음과 같이 정의할 수:-실행-에 대 한 호출 간의 상태 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A>및 다음 WorkflowInstance.OnNotify*.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: - Paused – The state between the last WorkflowInstance.OnNotify* and the next call to <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -일시 중지 됨-마지막 workflowinstance.onnotify *와 다음 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A> 호출 간의 상태

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"></xref> class with the specified workflow definition.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"> </xref> 지정한 워크플로 정의 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The activity that defines the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 정의 하는 작업입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"></xref> class with the specified workflow definition and definition identity.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"> </xref> 지정한 워크플로 정 및 정의 id를 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The activity that defines the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 정의 하는 작업입니다.

trans-unit.source: The definition identity.
trans-unit.target: 정의 id입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to begin sending pending tracking records to tracking participants asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 보류 중인 추적 레코드를 추적 참가자를 비동기적으로 보내기 위해 워크플로 런타임에 의해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The time period after which to abort the attempt.
trans-unit.target: 기간이 지난 후 시도를 중단할입니다.

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the track operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 추적 작업이 완료 되었을 때 호출 될 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The information about the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 비동기 작업에 대 한 정보입니다.

trans-unit.source: The status of the current track operation.
trans-unit.target: 현재 추적 작업의 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> instance for this <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl>이 대 한 인스턴스 <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"> </xref>.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl>

trans-unit.source: The controller instance for this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 워크플로 인스턴스의 컨트롤러 인스턴스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the definition identity of <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 정의 id를 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The definition identity of <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 정의 id <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Calls <xref:System.Disposable.Dispose*> on all extensions that implement <xref:System.IDisposable>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Disposable.Dispose*> <xref:System.IDisposable>.</xref:System.IDisposable> 를 구현 하는 모든 확장에 대해</xref:System.Disposable.Dispose*> 호출

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to end the track operation.
trans-unit.target: 추적 작업을 종료 하기 위해 워크플로 런타임에 의해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The status of the asynchronous track operation.
trans-unit.target: 비동기 추적 작업의 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to send pending tracking records to tracking participants.
trans-unit.target: 보류 중인 추적 레코드를 추적 참가자에 게 보내기 위해 워크플로 런타임에 의해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The time period after which to abort the attempt.
trans-unit.target: 기간이 지난 후 시도를 중단할입니다.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the list of activity that is blocking the update of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 업데이트를 차단 하는 활동의 목록을 검색 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The deserialized runtime state.
trans-unit.target: 역직렬화 된 런타임 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: The update map.
trans-unit.target: 업데이트 맵을 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The list of activity that is blocking the update.
trans-unit.target: 목록에서 업데이트를 차단 하는 활동입니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root environment for the workflow instance’s arguments and variables.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스의 인수 및 변수에 대 한 루트 환경을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set after the workflow instance is initialized and <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A> returns `true`, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스를 초기화 한 후이 속성을 설정 하는 경우 및 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A>반환 `true`, <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>throw 됩니다.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The root environment for the workflow instance’s arguments and variables.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스의 인수 및 변수에 대 한 루트 환경입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스의 고유 식별자를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스의 고유 식별자입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by the host to initialize the workflow instance with the workflow run-time state.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 런타임 상태와 워크플로 인스턴스를 초기화 하기 위해 호스트에 의해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The run-time state used to execute the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 실행 하는 데 런타임 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by the host to initialize the workflow instance with the argument values and execution properties.
trans-unit.target: 인수 값과 실행 속성을 사용 하 여 워크플로 인스턴스를 초기화 하기 위해 호스트에서 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The input parameters to the workflow, keyed by argument name.
trans-unit.target: 인수 이름으로 키가 지정 된 워크플로 입력된 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: The list of workflow execution properties.
trans-unit.target: 목록 워크플로 실행 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by the host to initialize the workflow instance with the workflow run-time state and update map.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 런타임 상태와 워크플로 인스턴스를 초기화 하 고 지도 업데이트 하기 위해 호스트에 의해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The run-time state used to execute the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 실행 하는 데 런타임 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: The update map.
trans-unit.target: 업데이트 맵을 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the workflow instance has been initialized.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스가 초기화 되었는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow instance has been initialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>워크플로 인스턴스가 초기화 되었으면; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that new instance keys should be associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스 키를이 인스턴스와 연결 해야 함을 호스트에 알리기 위해 워크플로 런타임에 의해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The instance keys to associate with this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 워크플로 인스턴스와 연결할 인스턴스 키입니다.

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 작업이 완료 될 때 호출 될 메서드.

trans-unit.source: An optional application-specific object that contains information about the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 비동기 작업에 대 한 정보를 포함 하는 선택적 응용 프로그램 관련 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the asynchronous associate keys operation.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 참조는 비동기 연결 키 작업입니다.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous call to ask host to flush pending tracking records to tracking participants.
trans-unit.target: 보류 중인 추적 레코드를 추적 참가자에 게 플러시하도록 호스트에 요청을 비동기 호출입니다.

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the track operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 추적 작업이 완료 되었을 때 호출 될 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The information about the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 비동기 작업에 대 한 정보입니다.

trans-unit.source: The status of the current track operation.
trans-unit.target: 현재 추적 작업의 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous call to ask the host to persist the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 호스트에 워크플로 지 속하도록 요청 하는 비동기 호출입니다.

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the persist operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 지속 작업이 완료 되었을 때 호출 될 메서드.

trans-unit.source: An optional application-specific object that contains information about the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 비동기 작업에 대 한 정보를 포함 하는 선택적 응용 프로그램 관련 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the current persist operation.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 참조를 현재 지속 작업입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that a resume bookmark operation is beginning.
trans-unit.target: 책갈피 다시 시작 작업이 시작 하 고 호스트에 알리기 위해 워크플로 런타임에 의해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The bookmark to resume.
trans-unit.target: 다시 시작 하는 책갈피입니다.

trans-unit.source: The data to be passed to the activity that created the <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 만든 작업에 전달할 데이터의 <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The interval in which the resume operation must complete before the operation is canceled and a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 다시 시작 작업을 완료 해야 작업을 취소 하기 전에 간격 <xref:System.TimeoutException>throw 됩니다.</xref:System.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the resume operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 다시 시작 작업이 완료 되 면 호출 될 메서드.

trans-unit.source: An optional application-specific object that contains information about the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 비동기 작업에 대 한 정보를 포함 하는 선택적 응용 프로그램 관련 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the asynchronous resume operation.
trans-unit.target: 비동기 다시 시작 작업에 대 한 참조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that a certain set of instance keys should no longer be associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 특정 인스턴스 키 집합을 더 이상 되도록이 인스턴스에 연결 된 호스트에 알리기 위해 워크플로 런타임에 의해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The list of keys to disassociate.
trans-unit.target: 연결을 끊을 키의 목록입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that an associate keys operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 연결 키 작업이 완료 되었음을 호스트에 알리기 위해 워크플로 런타임에 의해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The reference to the asynchronous associate keys operation.
trans-unit.target: 연결 키 작업을 비동기 작업에 대 한 참조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host when the flush tracking records operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 추적 레코드 플러시 작업이 완료 되 면 호스트에 알리기 위해 워크플로 런타임에 의해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The status of the asynchronous flush tracking records operation.
trans-unit.target: 비동기 추적 레코드 플러시 작업이의 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that a persist operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 지속 작업이 완료 되었음을 호스트에 알리기 위해 워크플로 런타임에 의해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The reference to the asynchronous persist operation.
trans-unit.target: 비동기에 대 한 참조 지속 작업입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that a resume bookmark operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 책갈피 다시 시작 작업이 완료 되었음을 호스트에 알리기 위해 워크플로 런타임에 의해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The reference to the asynchronous resume bookmark operation.
trans-unit.target: 책갈피 다시 시작 비동기 작업에 대 한 참조입니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates the result of a <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> resume operation.
trans-unit.target: 결과 나타내는 열거형 값 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref> 작업을 다시 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that the workflow instance has transitioned from the running state to the paused state.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스가 실행 중인 상태에서 일시 중지 된 상태로 전환 된 호스트에 알리기 위해 워크플로 런타임에 의해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host an unhandled exception has occurred in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스에서 처리 되지 않은 예외가 발생 했음을 호스트에 알리기 위해 워크플로 런타임에 의해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: 처리 되지 않은 예외입니다.

trans-unit.source: The activity that threw the exception.
trans-unit.target: 예외를 발생 시킨 작업입니다.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityInstance"></xref> representing the activity that threw the exception.
trans-unit.target: 고유 식별자는 <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityInstance"> </xref> 예외를 발생 시킨 활동이 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that an abort operation has been requested for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스에 대 한 중단 작업이 요청 되었습니다는 호스트에 알리기 위해 워크플로 런타임에 의해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Once OnRequestAbort is called, most <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> APIs except <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 한 번 OnRequestAbort 라고, 대부분의 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl>Api <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> 을 throw 합니다</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> 를 제외 하 고</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl>

trans-unit.source: It is expected that after OnRequestAbort is called a host will trend toward a state in which it can satisfy the abort.
trans-unit.target: OnRequestAbort를 호출한 후 호스트가 중단을 충족 시킬 수 있는 상태로 전환 되어야 합니다 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The reason for aborting the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스의 중단에 대 한 설명입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by the host to register the specified extension manager, validate that all required extensions are present, and to initialize the collection of extensions to be used.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 확장명 관리자에 등록, 필요한 모든 확장이 있는지 확인 하 고 사용할 확장명 컬렉션을 초기화할 수는 호스트에 의해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Extensions are keyed by type, and a host provided extension will always be used if provided.
trans-unit.target: 형식에 의해 확장 키 사용 및 호스트 제공 확장 제공 하는 경우 항상 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Extensions added through <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> use the runtime type of the object as the type key.
trans-unit.target: 통해 추가 된 확장 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>개체의 런타임 형식을 형식 키로 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Extensions providers added through <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> use the decared type T of the Func\<T> as the type key.
trans-unit.target: 통해 추가 된 확장 공급자 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>는 f 선언 된 형식 T를 사용 하 여\<T >를 형식 키로.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Extension providers contributed by activities through the various *ActivityMetadata.AddDefaultExtensionProvider methods are dropped if a host extension exists for the declared type or if there is a broader type provided through AddDefaultExtensionProvider (ex.
trans-unit.target: 다양 한 * activitymetadata.adddefaultextensionprovider 메서드를 통해 작업에서 제공한 확장 공급자가 선언된 형식에 대 한 호스트 확장이 있는 경우 또는 (예를 들어, 통해 제공 된 보다 광범위 한 형식이 있는 경우 삭제 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: if Func\<StreamWriter> is provided and Func\<TextWriter> is provided, only Func\<StreamWriter> will be kept).
trans-unit.target: 경우 Func\<StreamWriter > 제공 및 Func\<TextWriter > 제공만 Func\<StreamWriter > 유지).

trans-unit.source: If an extension does not exist in the collection that is required by an activity (expressed by calling \*ActivityMetadata.RequireExtension) a <xref:System.Activities.ValidationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 확장 작업에 필요한 컬렉션에 존재 하지 않는 경우 (호출 하 여 표현 \*ActivityMetadata.RequireExtension)는 <xref:System.Activities.ValidationException>throw 됩니다.</xref:System.Activities.ValidationException>

trans-unit.source: The extension manager to register.
trans-unit.target: 등록할 확장명 관리자입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the host supports the association of <xref:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceKeys*> with a run-time instance.
trans-unit.target: 호스트의 연결을 지원 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 <xref:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceKeys*>런타임에 인스턴스와.</xref:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceKeys*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the host supports the association of <xref:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceKeys*> with a workflow instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>호스트의 연결을 지 원하는 경우 <xref:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceKeys*>워크플로 인스턴스와; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceKeys*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext> used for scheduling the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>워크플로 인스턴스 예약에 사용 되는.</xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: If this property is set after the workflow instance is initialized and <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A> returns `true`, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스를 초기화 한 후이 속성을 설정 하는 경우 및 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A>반환 `true`, <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>throw 됩니다.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The synchronization context used for scheduling the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스 예약에 사용 되는 동기화 컨텍스트.

trans-unit.source: Throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if the workflow instance has been initialized, as determined by <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>워크플로 인스턴스에 있으면 초기화 된 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly*>.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly*> 기준으로</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> 발생 시킵니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A> returns `true`, then an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A>반환 `true`, 아니라면 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>throw 됩니다.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow definition of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스의 워크플로 정을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The workflow definition of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스의 워크플로 정의입니다.
